title: Little Miss Naughty and the Good Fairy
description: When Little Miss Naughty meets the Good Fairy, she sure is in for a surprise! Little Miss Naughty always wants to be . . . well, naughty. So she steals the Good Fairy’s wand and tries to ruin all the Mr. Men’s and Little Misses’ days! But she is surprised when everything keeps turning out for the best. And really, what fun is that?
author: Roger Hargreaves
